name: Facial Recognition Reverse Image Face Search API
description: Let your users search the Internet by face! Integrate FaceCheck facial search seamlessly with your app, website or software platform. FaceCheck's REST API is hassle-free and easy to use. For code examples visit https://facecheck.id/Face-Search/API
